medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Eight Views in the New Yoshiwara (Shin Yoshiwara hakkei 新吉原八景)
text: The classical Chinese poetic and pictorial theme of the Eight Views of the Xiao and Xiang Rivers is applied to the Yoshiwara pleasure quarter in this series. The inset cartouche in the upper right relates to one of these views, Night Rain over Xiaoxiang, by showing people with umbrellas walking through a street in the Yoshiwara. A prostitute has prepared the bed for a regular customer.
title: Night Rain with a Regular Customer
